front.title: Path Computation Element (PCE) Protocol Extension for Stateful PCE Usage in GMPLS Networks

abstract.t: The Path Computation Element (PCE) facilitates Traffic Engineering (TE) based path calculation in large, multi-domain, multi-region, or multi-layer networks. [Stateful-PCE] provides the fundamental PCEP extensions needed to support stateful PCE functions, without specifying the technology-specific extensions. This memo provides extensions required for PCE communication protocol (PCEP) so as to enable the usage of a stateful PCE capability in GMPLS networks.
